title: Question 15
prompt: Later in the business plan for Zest Stop, the company outlines a plan to open restaurants in Southern California and ship produce from local Bay Area farms, a distance of several hundred miles. Which of the goals mentioned in the Executive Summary could this plan conflict with?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback: Shipping produce from the Bay Area to Southern California means expending energy to move fruits and vegetables several hundred miles. Although the farms are local to the Bay Area, they are not local to Southern California. This conflicts with the goal of providing ecologically sound food, because shipping food over long distances uses fuel that produces pollution and greenhouse gasses.
